email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $50.75 per ton for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel I have in mind is the MV Ocean Star, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. Laycan is 15-20 October. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $49.50 per ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for the laycan? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $50.00 per ton, which is competitive given the vessel’s specifications and current market conditions. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per ton sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ll review the charter party once received. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John
